verses.verse: ה֚וֹי <WH1945> Woe הַשַּׁאֲנַנִּ֣ים <WH7600> to them [that are] at ease בְּצִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> in Zion וְהַבֹּטְחִ֖ים <WH982> and trust בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> in the mountain שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria נְקֻבֵי֙ <WH5344> [which are] named רֵאשִׁ֣ית <WH7225> chief הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of the nations וּבָ֥אוּ <WH935> came לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> to whom בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> to whom the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

עִבְר֤וּ <WH5674> Pass כַֽלְנֵה֙ <WH3641> ye unto Calneh וּרְא֔וּ <WH7200> and see וּלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> and go מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> there חֲמַ֣ת <WH2574> ye to Hamath רַבָּ֑ה <WH7227> greater וּרְד֣וּ <WH3381> then go down גַת־ <WH1661> to Gath פְּלִשְׁתּ֗ים <WH6430> of the Philistines הֲטוֹבִים֙ <WH2896> [be they] better מִן־ <WH4480> than הַמַּמְלָכ֣וֹת <WH4467> kingdoms הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these אִם־ <WH518> Or רַ֥ב <WH7227> greater גְּבוּלָ֖ם <WH1366> is their territory מִגְּבֻלְכֶֽם׃ <WH1366> is their territory
הַֽמְנַדִּ֖ים <WH5077> Ye that put far away לְי֣וֹם <WH3117> day רָ֑ע <WH7451> the evil וַתַּגִּישׁ֖וּן <WH5066> to come near שֶׁ֥בֶת <WH7675> and cause the seat חָמָֽס׃ <WH2555> of violence

הַשֹּֽׁכְבִים֙ <WH7901> That lie עַל־ <WH5921> on מִטּ֣וֹת <WH4296> upon beds שֵׁ֔ן <WH8127> of ivory וּסְרֻחִ֖ים <WH5628> and stretch עַל־ <WH5921> on עַרְשׂוֹתָ֑ם <WH6210> themselves upon their couches וְאֹכְלִ֤ים <WH398> and eat כָּרִים֙ <WH3733> the lambs מִצֹּ֔אן <WH6629> out of the flock וַעֲגָלִ֖ים <WH5695> and the calves מִתּ֥וֹךְ <WH8432> out of the midst מַרְבֵּֽק׃ <WH4770> of the stall

הַפֹּרְטִ֖ים <WH6527> That chant עַל־ <WH5921> unto פִּ֣י <WH6310> to the sound הַנָּ֑בֶל <WH5035> of the viol כְּדָוִ֕יד <WH1732> like David חָשְׁב֥וּ <WH2803> [and] invent לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> to themselves כְּלֵי־ <WH3627> to themselves instruments שִֽׁיר׃ <WH7892> of musick

הַשֹּׁתִ֤ים <WH8354> That drink בְּמִזְרְקֵי֙ <WH4219> in bowls יַ֔יִן <WH3196> wine וְרֵאשִׁ֥ית <WH7225> themselves with the chief שְׁמָנִ֖ים <WH8081> ointments יִמְשָׁ֑חוּ <WH4886> and anoint וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> have not נֶחְל֖וּ <WH2470> but they are not grieved עַל־ <WH5921> over שֵׁ֥בֶר <WH7667> for the affliction יוֹסֵֽף׃ <WH3130> of Joseph

לָכֵ֛ן <WH3651> Therefore עַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> will now יִגְל֖וּ <WH1540> Therefore now shall they go captive בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> with the first גֹּלִ֑ים <WH1540> that go captive וְסָ֖ר <WH5493> themselves shall be removed מִרְזַ֥ח <WH4797> and the banquet סְרוּחִֽים׃ <WH5628> of them that stretched פ

נִשְׁבַּע֩ <WH7650> hath sworn אֲדֹנָ֨י <WH136> The Lord יְהוִ֜ה <WH3069> GOD בְּנַפְשׁ֗וֹ <WH5315> by himself נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts מְתָאֵ֤ב <WH8374> I abhor אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I אֶת־ <WH853> גְּא֣וֹן <WH1347> the excellency יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob וְאַרְמְנֹתָ֖יו <WH759> his palaces שָׂנֵ֑אתִי <WH8130> and hate וְהִסְגַּרְתִּ֖י <WH5462> therefore will I deliver up עִ֥יר <WH5892> the city וּמְלֹאָֽהּ׃ <WH4393> with all that is therein

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become אִם־ <WH518> will be if יִוָּ֨תְר֜וּ <WH3498> And it shall come to pass if there remain עֲשָׂרָ֧ה <WH6235> ten אֲנָשִׁ֛ים <WH376> men בְּבַ֥יִת <WH1004> house אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> in one וָמֵֽתוּ׃ <WH4191> that they shall die

וּנְשָׂא֞וֹ <WH5375> shall take him up דּוֹד֣וֹ <WH1730> And a man's uncle וּמְסָרְפ֗וֹ <WH5635> and he that burneth לְהוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> him to bring out עֲצָמִים֮ <WH6106> the bones מִן־ <WH4480> from הַבַּיִת֒ <WH1004> out of the house וְאָמַ֞ר <WH559> and shall say לַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who בְּיַרְכְּתֵ֥י <WH3411> unto him that [is] by the sides הַבַּ֛יִת <WH1004> of the house הַע֥וֹד <WH5750> else עִמָּ֖ךְ <WH5973> one וְאָמַ֣ר <WH559> [Is there] yet [any] with thee? and he shall say אָ֑פֶס <WH657> No וְאָמַ֣ר <WH559> Then shall he say הָ֔ס <WH2013> Hold thy tongue כִּ֛י <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> is not לְהַזְכִּ֖יר <WH2142> for we may not make mention בְּשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> of the name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> For behold the LORD מְצַוֶּ֔ה <WH6680> commandeth וְהִכָּ֛ה <WH5221> and he will smite הַבַּ֥יִת <WH1004> house הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> the great רְסִיסִ֑ים <WH7447> with breaches וְהַבַּ֥יִת <WH1004> house הַקָּטֹ֖ן <WH6996> and the little בְּקִעִֽים׃ <WH1233> with clefts

הַיְרֻצ֤וּן <WH7323> run בַּסֶּ֙לַע֙ <WH5553> rock סוּסִ֔ים <WH5483> Shall horses אִֽם־ <WH518> lo יַחֲר֖וֹשׁ <WH2790> plow בַּבְּקָרִ֑ים <WH1241> bull כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הֲפַכְתֶּ֤ם <WH2015> have turned לְרֹאשׁ֙ <WH7219> into gall מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <WH4941> judgment וּפְרִ֥י <WH6529> and the fruit צְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> of righteousness לְלַעֲנָֽה׃ <WH3939> into hemlock

הַשְּׂמֵחִ֖ים <WH8055> cheer up לְלֹ֣א <WH3808> of nought דָבָ֑ר <WH1697> in a thing הָאֹ֣מְרִ֔ים <WH559> which say הֲל֣וֹא <WH3808> by בְחָזְקֵ֔נוּ <WH2392> our strength לָקַ֥חְנוּ <WH3947> Have we not taken לָ֖נוּ קַרְנָֽיִם׃ <WH7161> to us horns

כִּ֡י <WH3588> for הִנְנִי֩ <WH2005> I am going מֵקִ֨ים <WH6965> But behold I will raise up עֲלֵיכֶ֜ם <WH5921> against בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> the God הַצְּבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts גּ֑וֹי <WH1471> against you a nation וְלָחֲצ֥וּ <WH3905> and they shall afflict אֶתְכֶ֛ם <WH853> מִלְּב֥וֹא <WH935> you from the entering in חֲמָ֖ת <WH2574> of Hemath עַד־ <WH5704> against נַ֥חַל <WH5158> unto the river הָעֲרָבָֽה׃ <WH6160> of the wilderness ס
